OOC: Whenever you want! ;)

Balistica grabbed the grenade and clenched it in her hand very
tightly. She flew at avertiginous speed, knowing they were hunted for
a long time. Whatever. It was better than anything those bastards had
prepared for them.

Far under, though, the door was blasted away by the final blow of the
demolition tools. The security squad entered the lab, and, seeing the
vent duct ripped open, triggered the ventilation security devices.
Those two wouldn't get out alive.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "HURRY!!!! IT'S TIME TO RUN FOR ALL SPEED!!!!"said Windlord while he
decreased his speed and was along side Balistica, after that he
offered a granade"Take it... I will told ya what we will do when we
reach the exit..."
> 
> OOC: Will they reach the exit soon?

> 
>   Balistica: Not for long...
> 
>   She prepared her canon, but she wasn't sure she liked the idea of
>   leaving the door alone. Already, sparks were flying where the Preds
>   where sawing the door open...
